Class ProjectileRay

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.annabeths.GameGenerics.GameObject
      • io.github.annabeths.GameGenerics.PhysicsObject
        • io.github.annabeths.Projectiles.Projectile
          • io.github.annabeths.Projectiles.ProjectileRay
  • public class ProjectileRay
extends Projectile
    A type of projectile that travels instantly and inflicts damage on objects in its path
    Since:
    Assessment 2

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectileRay

        public ProjectileRay​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin,
                     float angle,
                     ProjectileData data,
                     boolean isPlayerProjectile)
        Create a projectile ray with a default distance of 500 units.
        Parameters:
        origin - the starting point of the ray
        data - the type of projectile
        angle - the angle the ray is facing
        isPlayerProjectile - if the ray belongs to the player

      • ProjectileRay

        public ProjectileRay​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin,
                     float angle,
                     ProjectileData data,
                     boolean isPlayerProjectile,
                     float maxDistance,
                     float damageMultiplier)
        Parameters:
        origin - the starting point of the ray
        data - the type of projectile
        angle - the angle the ray is facing
        isPlayerProjectile - if the ray belongs to the player
        maxDistance - the maximum distance the projectile can move
        damageMultiplier - how much to multiply the damage by
